articles.author: Raphael Abraham
articles.title: Zone of Interest director Jonathan Glazer: 'I'm suspicious of people making Holocaust films' - Financial Times
articles.description: As his Auschwitz-set movie wins three Baftas, the director talks about challenging cinema-goers — and the banality of evil
articles.content:
Sound steals focus from the start. In Jonathan Glazers astonishing, Oscar-nominated The Zone of Interest, the atrocities being committed inside Auschwitz are never seen, only heard. 
Background nois… [+14072 chars]
